mapper.select: select id, bbs_id, owner_id, owner, content, date_format(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') create_date, order_id from bbs_comment where is_delete = 0 and bbs_id = #{bbsId}
mapper.insert: insert into bbs_comment (bbs_id, owner_id, owner, content, order_id) values (#{bbsId}, #{ownerId}, #{owner}, #{content}, #{orderId});
